lessons.title: Question: Justify
lessons.interactiveContent:
Which property do we use to define how elements are arranged and grouped along the main axis?

justify-contentjustifyarrange-content

Make sure to pick justify-content.

lessons.title: Question: Default
lessons.interactiveContent:
How can we make these items display at the start of the main axis?

With justify-content set to flex-start inside the .container ruleWith justify-content set to flex-start inside the .item ruleWith justify-content set to start in both the .container and .item rules

With justify-content set to flex-start inside the .container rule.

lessons.title: Example: Flex-end
lessons.interactiveContent:
Add a property value so that items group at the end of the main axis.

Make sure to type flex-end.

lessons.title: Example: Column start
lessons.interactiveContent:
Make sure the items are stacked vertically.

Make sure to type column.

lessons.title: Example: Column end
lessons.interactiveContent:
Make sure the items group at the bottom of the container in a vertical orientation.

Make sure to pick column, followed by flex-end.

lessons.title: Question : Center
lessons.interactiveContent:
When should we assign center as value for justify-content?

To position items at the center of the containerTo position items at the top-center space of the containerTo position items at the beginning of the container

To position items at the center of the container.

lessons.title: Question : Space-between
lessons.interactiveContent:
What justify-content value should Dan use to have space between the buttons?

space-betweenspace-aroundcenter

Make sure to pick space-between.

lessons.title: Question : Space-around
lessons.interactiveContent:
Dan wants to have space around the game buttons as shown to make them look better. What justify-content value should Dan use?

space-aroundcenterspace-between

Make sure to pick space-around.

lessons.title: Example : Space-around
lessons.interactiveContent:
Put space around the buttons.

Make sure to type space-around.

lessons.title: Example : Space-between
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code a justify-content value to add space between the buttons.

Make sure to type space-between.

lessons.title: Question: Default
lessons.interactiveContent:
Which align-items value might this example use?

stretchflex-startflex-end

Make sure to pick stretch.

lessons.title: Question: Align items
lessons.interactiveContent:
Which property aligns the items based on the cross axis?

align-itemsflex-directionjustify-content

Make sure to pick align-items.

lessons.title: Example: Flex start
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code a value to align the items at the beginning of the cross-axis.

Make sure to pick flex, followed by -, and finally start.

lessons.title: Example: Row 1
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code the values so that the items appear as a row and centered inside their parent.

Make sure to pick row, followed by center.

lessons.title: Example: Row 3
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code a value to align the items at the end of the cross axis.

Make sure to pick flex, followed by -, and finally end.
